article_title: Aloha, Bernie: Sanders Wins Hawaii To Finish Saturday Caucus Sweep
article_text:
As Leah already reported, Sen. Bernie Sanders had a great night. He won resounding victories in the Washington State and Alaska caucuses, garnering 70+ percent of the vote. Now, the self-described Democratic socialist can add Hawaii to his list of victories, finishing his sweep of yesterday's primary contests. In Hawaii, Sanders crushed Clinton 70/29.

Democratic voters were feeling the Bern this weekend.

article_metadata.description: Hawaii win concludes a good election day for Bernie....05/27/2016 9:38:50AM EST.
article_metadata.author: Matt Vespa

He won resounding victories in the Washington State and Alaska caucuses, garnering 70+ percent of the vote.
As Leah already reported, Sen. Bernie Sanders had a great night.
